MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm lost.
This is due to the fact that I had visited a nearby forest on my day off for training, and because it was a place where I used to run a lot, I went off the road to enjoy nature.
I proceed through the dark forest, careful of my footing. It's a relief to have the moonlight, but I don't want to move any further. As I'm thinking about this, I suddenly hear a voice from above.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Conductor?
My eyes met with Brittany's, who is straddling a tree branch. Her figure, a dwarf from the Shana clan, is illuminated by the moonlight, revealing a lovely silhouette, like a fairy from a fairy tale.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I'm so surprised. I never expected to meet you in the forest at night.
It's rare to even meet anyone here.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Did you get lost, by any chance?

...I know it sounds shameful, but yes.
If I could ask, I'd appreciate it if you could come home with me later.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I understand. Then I'll take you later. But may I ask you to wait a little longer?
The watchtower has just been completed.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: In the Brecheliant forest, where Brittany was born and raised, the forest rangers would build watchtowers in trees to see if there was any danger in the forest or if anyone was in trouble. It's just a simple floor and a roof to keep out the rain and dew.

Forest rangers have a job that involves patrolling the forests of Verforet.
In a country with many deep forests, it is a very important role.
Brittany was a forest ranger in one of the most dangerous areas. She's not a physically strong person, but I think I'm getting a glimpse of how she was able to do it.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Would you like to come up, Conductor?
The floor is already finished.
That sounds like fun. Yeah, I'll intrude on you for a bit.

I accept her offer and go up to Brittany.
As she said, it's more like a wooden frame than a hut, with just a simple roof and floor.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I've been training to become stronger since I joined the SSS, but I also wanted to train as a forest ranger again. That's why I'm here in the forest at night.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's so relaxing in the forest...
especially when I look up at the sky in the forest ranger hut like this.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Do you know, Conductor,
it is said that the Shana people came from somewhere else, not here?

I've heard a bit about it.
I also heard that you appeared with thunder and lightning, Brittany.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's right. I was picked up by my mother―Rennes' mother. She appeared in the ruins of Brecheliant on the night of the storm with the thunder and lightning.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Fortunately, I wasn't the only one. There were other Shana people in the village.
They, too, had settled in Brecheliant after their ancestors had appeared there the same way.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
In retrospect, I'm very grateful that I was not alone among the Shana.
But as a young child, I felt terribly lonely because I was the only Shana child.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
At such times, I would sneak out of the house at night,
climb up to the forest ranger huts like this and look up at the moon.
Brittany's hand goes to the moon, which shines brightly on the forest.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: When I heard about the thunder and lightning and the appearance of the Lord, as a child, I thought that the Shana people came from the sky. I never doubted that the moon was the place where the Shana were.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Of course, now that we know there's no causal connection between lightning and the moon, and we don't think the moon is the home of the Shana people.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But since then, whenever I get lonely, I come here to look at the moon, to think about it, and to calm my mind. And now, this cider, handed down from the Shana clan, is an indispensable accompaniment!

With that, Brittany serves me homemade cider.
The refreshing acidity and fizziness feels good in my throat.

But for some reason, Brittany's profile
looks a little shadowy as she takes a sip as well.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's not right...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Conductor, I'm sorry to make you drink this, but it's a failure.
Please don't take another sip.
Is it? I think it's very good.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
No, Shana's ciders are inherently much better.
I think I messed up on this one.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Conductor, I'll have a proper one for you tomorrow.
I hope you'll drink it again.

With a serious look in her eyes, Brittany makes a request.
Brittany is proud of being a Shana and loves apples, so she wants me to drink the best.
All right, I'll have some more of that authentic Shana cider.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Brittany
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Really?! Thank you!

Brittany's face breaks into a smile.
It's even better than this cider, which is good enough.
